to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: command line imm programs
body:
Has centericq been updated to support Oscar? The last time I used it 
(about 6 months or so after AOL dropped toc) it wouldn't connect.
